text: Nâ€™olwekyo kale kowoola (abantu okujja eri e ddiini) era obeere mwesimbu nga bwe walagirwa, era togoberera kwagala kwabwe era gamba nti nzikiriza e bitabo ebyo Katonda bye yassa, era nalagirwa okukola obwenkanya wakati wa mmwe. Katonda ye mulabirizi waffe era omulabirizi wa mmwe ffe tulina emirimu gyaffe na mmwe mulina emirimu gya mmwe. Tewali nkayana wakati waffe na mmwe (anti amazima meyolefu), Katonda agenda kutusisinkanya (ffe na mmwe) era gyali yokka yeeri obuddo
